name: Legends of Venari
summary: Legends of Venari (LoV) is a creature collection RPG that is being built on the ETH network. LoV, in its current state (the Alpha Season), is an idle browser-based game where players catch Venari creatures (similar to Pokemón GO without the exercise). LoV is an iterative project built alongside the web3 community as features get rolled out over seasons (3-4 Months).
